pkgmetadata.longdescription: Taxa Waterbeheer Nederland voor R // The TWN-list (Taxa Waterbeheer Nederland) is the Dutch standard for naming taxons in Dutch Watermanagement. This package makes it easier to use the TWN-list for ecological analyses. It consists of two parts. First it makes the TWN-list itself available in R. Second, it has a few functions that make it easy to perform some basic and often recurring tasks for checking and consulting taxonomic data from the TWN-list.
